statements: SELECT * FROM TeleoncologyMeetings;
SELECT meeting_type, scheduled_date FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE scheduled_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT participants FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE meeting_type = 'Team Meeting';
SELECT DISTINCT(location) FROM TeleoncologyMeetings;
SELECT agenda FROM TeleoncologyMeetings ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC, scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE scheduled_date = '2022-07-15'
SELECT agenda, meeting_type FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE location = 'Hospital A' ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC
SELECT agenda, participants FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE scheduled_time > '13:00:00'
SELECT * FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-08-01' AND location = 'Clinic B' ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_type FROM TeleoncologyMeetings WHERE participants LIKE '%Dr.%'
SELECT * FROM teleoncology_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teleoncology_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teleoncology_teams WHERE team_location = 'New York';
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teleoncology_teams WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teleoncology_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM teleoncology_teams;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM teleoncology_teams WHERE team_location = 'New York';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(meeting_id) AS total_meetings FROM teleoncology_teams JOIN cancer_meetings ON teleoncology_teams.team_id = cancer_meetings.team_id GROUP BY teleoncology_teams.team_name;
SELECT team_name, meeting_date, meeting_time, meeting_agenda FROM teleoncology_teams JOIN cancer_meetings ON teleoncology_teams.team_id = cancer_meetings.team_id WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT team_name, meeting_date, TIME_FORMAT(meeting_time, '%h:%i %p') AS formatted_time FROM teleoncology_teams JOIN cancer_meetings ON teleoncology_teams.team_id = cancer_meetings.team_id ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM multidisciplinary_meetings;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time FROM multidisciplinary_meetings WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE consult_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consult_date DESC;
SELECT team_lead, is_virtual FROM multidisciplinary_meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM multidisciplinary_meetings WHERE is_virtual = TRUE;
SELECT team_lead, meeting_date, meeting_time FROM multidisciplinary_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members INNER JOIN multidisciplinary_meetings ON team_members.team_id = multidisciplinary_meetings.meeting_id WHERE is_virtual = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE consult_date = '2022-07-15' AND consult_time > '12:00:00';

SELECT team_lead, member_name, member_role FROM multidisciplinary_meetings INNER JOIN team_members ON multidisciplinary_meetings.meeting_id = team_members.team_id ORDER BY team_lead ASC, member_role DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, location FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, location FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS meeting_count FROM teams JOIN meetings ON teams.team_id = meetings.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, location FROM teams WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' AND duration > '01:00:00';
SELECT patient_name, consultation_date FROM consultations INNER JOIN patients ON consultations.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE consultation_type = 'Follow-Up';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(meeting_id) AS total_meetings FROM teams LEFT JOIN meetings ON teams.team_id = meetings.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(meeting_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM TeleoncologyTeams;
SELECT eam_name, eam_specialty FROM TeleoncologyTeams ORDER BY eam_specialty;
SELECT eam_location FROM TeleoncologyTeams WHERE eam_specialty = 'Oncology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.eam_id = MedicalRecords.eam_id AND Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM TeleoncologyTeams;
SELECT eam_name, eam_specialty FROM TeleoncologyTeams WHERE eam_location='Hospital';
SELECT eam_name, eam_specialty FROM TeleoncologyTeams ORDER BY eam_specialty DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Consultations WHERE consultation_type='Follow-up';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_diagnosis='Cancer' ORDER BY patient_age ASC;
